T02TD2023E:88a-1: shr'i rakta ya m'a s'a dha nam /
T02TD2023E:88a-3: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD2023E:88a-4: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2023E:88a-5: bla ma de rjes rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar po //
T02TD2023E:88a-6: rang snang lus 'khyud bde bas gang zhig gzhan don 'jug / rdo rjes mtshan ba'i dbyug pa mi mgor ldan pa'i phyag / zhal gcig 'jigs pa sel la gus pas mgos phyag 'tshal /
T02TD2023E:88a-7: spyin pa tshul khrims la sogs ldan //
T02TD2023E:88a-8: blo bzangs sems can don rtse gcig / byams sogs yon tan yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD2023E:88a-9: dad dang thos pas rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2023E:88a-10: snga bar brtse ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2023E:88a-11: dang por kha sogs dag byas nas //
T02TD2023E:88a-12: skye bos dben sogs dur khrod sogs //
T02TD2023E:88a-13: bde ba'i stan la brtsam par bya //
T02TD2023E:88a-14: rang gi snying gar padma bkod //
T02TD2023E:88a-15: shin tu gsal ba'i nyi ma blta //
T02TD2023E:88b-0: yam yig dbus su h'um @88b yig ni //
T02TD2023E:88b-2: de yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i /
T02TD2023E:88b-3: rang lhag lha yi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD2023E:88b-4: rdo rje 'chang bdag rnam pa can //
T02TD2023E:88b-5: bla ma sangs rgyas de yi sras //
T02TD2023E:88b-6: khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can yang //
T02TD2023E:88b-7: dkyil 'khor pa yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2023E:88b-8: dmigs nas de dag rnams la phyag / lus kyi tshogs kyis rnam par brtson //
T02TD2023E:88b-9: tsartsi k'a la sogs pa yis //
T02TD2023E:88b-10: mchod pa byas la sdig pa bshags //
T02TD2023E:88b-11: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdig / bgyid dang de bzhin bgyid stsal gang //
T02TD2023E:88b-12: gang yang rjes su yi rang ba //
T02TD2023E:88b-13: de dag dus gsum mgon la bshags //
T02TD2023E:88b-14: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras //
T02TD2023E:88b-15: 'phags rnams dge tshogs rjes yi rang //
T02TD2023E:88b-16: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos //
T02TD2023E:88b-17: tshogs kyi mchog bcas skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2023E:88b-18: yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la //
T02TD2023E:88b-19: rang gi lus ni dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD2023E:88b-20: dam pa'i chos kun ston pa yi //
T02TD2023E:88b-21: sgra dbyangs mdzes pas bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2023E:88b-22: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
T02TD2023E:88b-23: de sras lam gyur spyin sogs tshul //
T02TD2023E:88b-24: sku gsum ye shes thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD2023E:88b-25: rab tu dang bas bsten par bgyi //
T02TD2023E:88b-26: sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub phyir //
T02TD2023E:88b-27: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed bgyi //
T02TD2023E:88b-28: bsod nams kun nas gang bsags pa //
T02TD2023E:88b-29: rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir bsngo'o //
T02TD2023E:88b-30: dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed du /
T02TD2023E:88b-31: gyur nas bdag gis 'gro phan bgyi //
T02TD2023E:88b-32: smon lam 'di ni byas nas su //
T02TD2023E:88b-33: blo yis de rnams gshegs de nas //
T02TD2023E:88b-34: brtse bas cho ga bzhin bltas te //
T02TD2023E:88b-35: sna tshogs stong par rnam par bsam //
T02TD2023E:88b-36: rang bzhin dang bral stong pa ste //
T02TD2023E:88b-37: rgyu yis kyang ni mtshan ma med //
T02TD2023E:88b-38: rnam par rtog dang bral nyid kyis //
T02TD2023E:88b-39: smon pa rnam par spangs pa'o //
T02TD2023E:88b-40: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2023E:88b-41: brtan par byas nas sems de ni //
T02TD2023E:88b-42: aam yig las byung nyi ma der //
T02TD2023E:88b-43: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje ste //
T02TD2023E:88b-44: kun nas sngon po rtse lnga pa //
T02TD2023E:88b-46: bsrung ba'i don du bsgom par bya //
T02TD2023E:88b-47: rdo rjes sa gzhi khor yug dang //
T02TD2023E:88b-48: ra ba gur ni de bzhin du //
T02TD2023E:88b-49: sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2023E:89a-0: @89a * // slar yang bsam gtan brtsam par bya //
T02TD2023E:89a-1: der ni sna tshogs pad zla la //
T02TD2023E:89a-2: sam byung rdo rje bzang po yi //
T02TD2023E:89a-3: yan lag chos 'byung zur gsum dkar //
T02TD2023E:89a-4: sna tshogs padma rdo rje dang //
T02TD2023E:89a-5: son cing gyen du gnas bsgom de'i //
T02TD2023E:89a-6: dbus su slar yang dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD2023E:89a-7: bhr'um yig 'khor lo las skyes pa //
T02TD2023E:89a-8: rtag pa'i yan lag yang dag byung //
T02TD2023E:89a-9: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD2023E:89a-10: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2023E:89a-11: dra ba dra phyed kyis spras shing //
T02TD2023E:89a-12: stegs bu lha mos mdzes byas pa //
T02TD2023E:89a-13: sna tshogs rtse mo rlung gis bskyod //
T02TD2023E:89a-14: ba dan dril bu dang ldan pa //
T02TD2023E:89a-15: sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam par mnan //
T02TD2023E:89a-16: zla ba nyi ma rgyal ba'i gdan //
T02TD2023E:89a-17: shar phyogs su ni dkar po che //
T02TD2023E:89a-18: lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan //
T02TD2023E:89a-19: nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste //
T02TD2023E:89a-20: byang ni ljang gu yang dag mtshungs //
T02TD2023E:89a-22: dbus kyis gzhi rnam bsgom bya //
T02TD2023E:89a-23: phyogs kyi kha dog dbye ba 'dis //
T02TD2023E:89a-24: sna tshogs rdo rje'ang bsgom par bya //
T02TD2023E:89a-25: thog kyang de bzhin bsam bya zhing //
T02TD2023E:89a-26: rtsig pa so so go rims bzhin //
T02TD2023E:89a-27: rnam pa lnga ni rnam bsgoms nas //
T02TD2023E:89a-28: sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par bsgom //
T02TD2023E:89a-29: rnam pa lnga des dpal ldan ni //
T02TD2023E:89a-30: rdo rje gshin rje 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2023E:89a-31: sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar grags //
T02TD2023E:89a-32: de yang dbye bas brjod par bya //
T02TD2023E:89a-33: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la //
T02TD2023E:89a-34: padma nyi ma dbyangs zung dgod //
T02TD2023E:89a-35: de yis zla ba ka yig sogs //
T02TD2023E:89a-36: da dha da dha ya la yang //
T02TD2023E:89a-37: spel te zung des rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD2023E:89a-38: zla ba dmar po bsgom par bya //
T02TD2023E:89a-39: 'di dag kho na rdzogs pa ni //
T02TD2023E:89a-40: me long lta bu'i ye shes brjod //
T02TD2023E:89a-41: mnyam pa nyid ni de gcig nyid //
T02TD2023E:89a-42: so sor kun rtog de byung h'um //
T02TD2023E:89a-43: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni //
T02TD2023E:89a-44: de las byung ba'i rnam par bsam //
T02TD2023E:89a-45: rdo rje dbyug pa dbyug pa che //
T02TD2023E:89a-46: mi mgo ser pos rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2023E:89a-47: nor bu me shel lta bu yi //
T02TD2023E:89a-49: aom badzra danda a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2023E:89a-51: de las byung ba dkar po'i nyi 'od snang ba thub mchog 'od 'phro rang snang gis sku 'khyud //
T02TD2023E:89a-52: sgeg pa'i khro bo'i tshul can mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'chang gi mtshan 'chang ba //
T02TD2023E:89b-0: g-yon brkyang gdan @89b bzhugs 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang ldan mi mgo so sor mtshan pa'i dbyug pa thogs //
T02TD2023E:89b-1: gtum po bdud rtsi'i tshogs kyi khu bas yongs su gang ba'i padma'i snod ni bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2023E:89b-2: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD2023E:89b-3: ye shes rdo rje 'dzin bdag nyid //
T02TD2023E:89b-4: rnam pa lnga yi rang bzhin gang //
T02TD2023E:89b-5: rnal 'byor zhes ni mngon par brjod //
T02TD2023E:89b-7: 'dod chags chen po'i gdul bya ni //
T02TD2023E:89b-8: 'gro ba gsum po mnyam bltas nas //
T02TD2023E:89b-9: rang snying ye shes 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2023E:89b-10: 'gro ba sangs rgyas gzugs can byas //
T02TD2023E:89b-11: rang gi lus la mnyam par gzhug / bde ba dam pa'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2023E:89b-12: bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa bsgom //
T02TD2023E:89b-13: kun du rtog pa thams cad spongs //
T02TD2023E:89b-14: 'di ni de nyid gsum sngags mchog / ho dmar gnyis kyi dbus gnas pa //
T02TD2023E:89b-15: ji ltar skar mda' 'pho ba ltar //
T02TD2023E:89b-16: de nas byang chub sems la gzhug / snying rje chags pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD2023E:89b-17: rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nyid zhu //
T02TD2023E:89b-18: byams sogs tsartsi ka sogs kyis //
T02TD2023E:89b-20: thugs rje'i khro bo rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig / sa gsum mtha' dag rmongs pa sol mdzod cig / jo bo bdud bzhi po 'di las rgyal ba //
T02TD2023E:89b-21: sems ni g-yengs so rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig /'jig rten mgron gnyer stong nyid bzhugs sam ci //
T02TD2023E:89b-22: rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams nyid kyis bzhengs //
T02TD2023E:89b-23: byang chub rang bzhin 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas //
T02TD2023E:89b-24: khyod ni stong nyid sems shing ci la bzhugs //
T02TD2023E:89b-25: khu ba de bskul zhu bar ni //
T02TD2023E:89b-26: gyur cing bcud de'i rjes su zhugs //
T02TD2023E:89b-27: glu 'di dag gi rjes mthun ngor //
T02TD2023E:89b-28: de rnams rgud bzhin 'bod pa'i phyir //
T02TD2023E:89b-29: khu ba yongs gyur pam las skyes //
T02TD2023E:89b-30: sna tshogs padma nyid kyil du //
T02TD2023E:89b-31: khros shing dregs bcas dmar po ni //
T02TD2023E:89b-32: rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2023E:89b-33: smin ma rno zhing rab 'bar ba //
T02TD2023E:89b-34: rmig pa brdabs pas 'jigs par byed //
T02TD2023E:89b-35: mam yig sa bon las byung ba //
T02TD2023E:89b-37: ma he de yi rgyab gnas pa //
T02TD2023E:89b-38: mi mgo ser pos mtshan pa yi //
T02TD2023E:89b-39: rdo rje'i dbyug pa 'od zer can //
T02TD2023E:89b-40: dkar po gdul dka' 'dul byed bsgom //
T02TD2023E:90a-1: yang sa bon de dbus son //
T02TD2023E:90a-2: nyi ma dang bcas me long gi / gzugs brnyan ltar bsams de 'od kyis //
T02TD2023E:90a-3: sna tshogs dus dgra'i gzugs can byas //
T02TD2023E:90a-4: de la yang dag bcug nas ni //
T02TD2023E:90a-5: rdo rje'i dbyug pa las byung ba'i //
T02TD2023E:90a-7: bdag nyid 'di ltar bsgom par bya //
T02TD2023E:90a-8: khams gsum bdud kyi dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2023E:90a-10: drag shul bskal pa'i me 'bar sku //
T02TD2023E:90a-11: khro gnyer 'khyog po 'jigs su rung / mgrin par h'um gi rnam pa gang //
T02TD2023E:90a-13: nyi ma'i gzugs la 'gran pa yi //
T02TD2023E:90a-14: spyan gsum 'phro ba dang ldan pa //
T02TD2023E:90a-15: mche ba 'bar zhing gtsigs pa'i zhal //
T02TD2023E:90a-16: smin ma sma ra mgo skyes gyen //
T02TD2023E:90a-17: nya phyis lta bu'i mgo bo lngas //
T02TD2023E:90a-18: dbu la rnam par brgyan pa ste //
T02TD2023E:90a-19: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas mnan pa yi //
T02TD2023E:90a-20: dus ni rgyal bar byed pa po //
T02TD2023E:90a-21: 'bar ba'i phreng ba dmar po yis //
T02TD2023E:90a-22: sa yi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag khyab //
T02TD2023E:90a-23: dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2023E:90a-24: dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed dmar //
T02TD2023E:90a-25: phyag g-yas rdo rje'i dbyug pa ni //
T02TD2023E:90a-26: dkar po mi mgo ser pos mtshan //
T02TD2023E:90a-27: g-yon na padma'i snod mchog ni //
T02TD2023E:90a-28: dkar po bdud rtsi lnga yis gang //
T02TD2023E:90a-29: sbom zhing thung la gsus pa 'phyang //
T02TD2023E:90a-30: mgo bo'i do shal rnam 'phyang ba //
T02TD2023E:90a-31: zhal nas khrag 'dzag mgul par ni //
T02TD2023E:90a-32: rang snang shes rab ma yis 'khyud //
T02TD2023E:90a-33: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can //
T02TD2023E:90a-34: gdengs can dbang po khros pas brgyan //
T02TD2023E:90a-35: mtha' yas sngon po klu dbang gis //
T02TD2023E:90a-36: dbu skra bcings mdzes 'jigs par byed //
T02TD2023E:90a-37: klu rgyal 'jog po dmar po yi //
T02TD2023E:90a-38: rnam par drag po'i rna rgyan byas //
T02TD2023E:90a-39: sna tshogs rigs ldan dpung pa'i rgyan //
T02TD2023E:90a-40: klu rgyal drung skyong ser po ni //
T02TD2023E:90a-42: padma dkar po mgul ba'i rgyan //
T02TD2023E:90a-43: ljang gu stobs kyi rgyu yis kyang //
T02TD2023E:90a-44: mchod phyir thogs pa shin tu mdzes //
T02TD2023E:90a-45: gdengs can nor rgyas bdud rtsi yi //
T02TD2023E:90a-46: kha dog lta bus ska rags byas //
T02TD2023E:90a-47: pad rtsa lta bur dkar ba'i mdog / padma chen pos rkang gdub byas //
T02TD2023E:90b-0: thams cad phat kyi sgra drag @90b pos //
T02TD2023E:90b-1: lce gnyis mche ba'i phreng ba can //
T02TD2023E:90b-2: de nas rang nyid pad nyi la //
T02TD2023E:90b-3: sa bon h'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD2023E:90b-4: rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar //
T02TD2023E:90b-5: mgo bo ser pos rnam par brgyan //
T02TD2023E:90b-6: ji ltar dangs pa'i shel dag la //
T02TD2023E:90b-7: dza ba'i me tog drug tu gzhag / dza ba'i me tog des mtshungs pa //
T02TD2023E:90b-8: rab tu gsal bar snang bar 'gyur //
T02TD2023E:90b-9: de bzhin de dbus nyi mar gnas //
T02TD2023E:90b-10: gsal bar der son gdan dag la //
T02TD2023E:90b-11: mar me 'bar ba'i rtse mo lta'i //
T02TD2023E:90b-12: h'um gi rnam pa rab tu bsam //
T02TD2023E:90b-14: sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa //
T02TD2023E:90b-16: 'on kyang mgo phreng skam po can //
T02TD2023E:90b-17: de mtshan rdo rje ro langs ma //
T02TD2023E:90b-18: kha cig rdo rje gshin rje yi //
T02TD2023E:90b-19: gshed ma zhes grags rig pa yi //
T02TD2023E:90b-20: dga' ba'i tshogs rgyun 'bab pa mo //
T02TD2023E:90b-21: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba //
T02TD2023E:90b-22: h'um yig las byung rdo rje dang //
T02TD2023E:90b-23: bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang ba yang //
T02TD2023E:90b-25: bltas nas gsang sngags aom sarbba //
T02TD2023E:90b-26: la sogs brjod cing mdun gnas ma //
T02TD2023E:90b-27: bde chags thugs ma rang snang gi //
T02TD2023E:90b-28: shes rab ma yis gtso bo 'khyud //
T02TD2023E:90b-30: bde ba 'bebs pa'i don du gnyer //
T02TD2023E:90b-31: lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2023E:90b-32: de yi mjug thogs bsgom par bya //
T02TD2023E:90b-33: shes rab lte 'og mtsho skyes ni //
T02TD2023E:90b-34: 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po de'i //
T02TD2023E:90b-35: lte bar gnas pa'i h'um yig dmar //
T02TD2023E:90b-36: de yi steng du gnas pa yi //
T02TD2023E:90b-37: padma'i snal ma'i gzugs can ni //
T02TD2023E:90b-38: spyi bo'i bdud rtsi las 'thon pa //
T02TD2023E:90b-39: ri mo dkar po gsal bar bya //
T02TD2023E:90b-40: shes rab 'phel ba nyer gnas gang //
T02TD2023E:90b-42: gzugs can gshin rje 'joms byed du //
T02TD2023E:90b-43: rtogs nas rnam rtog zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD2023E:90b-44: sngags kyis kun nas byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2023E:90b-45: aom dharmma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2023E:90b-47: rang snying 'od zer lcags kyu yis //
T02TD2023E:90b-48: mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
T02TD2023E:90b-49: spyan drangs zhal nas rnam kun gzhug / bde ba zhugs pa snying ga ru //
T02TD2023E:90b-50: zhu byas blo ldan de dbyung bya //
T02TD2023E:90b-51: rdo rje'i lam nas zhu ba de //
T02TD2023E:91a-2: sa bon rang bzhin can du blta //
T02TD2023E:91a-4: cho ga bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom //
T02TD2023E:91a-5: dbus su ya yig las byung ba'i //
T02TD2023E:91a-6: gco bo bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD2023E:91a-7: shar du kshe dang 'khor lo las //
T02TD2023E:91a-8: byung ba'i rtag pa phyag gnyis pa ;
T02TD2023E:91a-9: / dkar po g-yas na 'khor lo g-yon //
T02TD2023E:91a-10: de bzhin thod pa bsnams par bsgom //
T02TD2023E:91a-11: lhor ni ma yig rin chen las //
T02TD2023E:91a-12: skyes pa'i rin chen 'byung ldan ni //
T02TD2023E:91a-13: btsom gser gyi mdog lta bus //
T02TD2023E:91a-14: g-yas na rin chen che mchog bsnams //
T02TD2023E:91a-15: g-yas pa min na thod pa'o //
T02TD2023E:91a-16: nub tu chags pa rdo rje can //
T02TD2023E:91a-17: me yi sa bon padmas skyes //
T02TD2023E:91a-19: padma dmar dang thod pa ni //
T02TD2023E:91a-20: phyag g-yas cig shos dag tu dgod //
T02TD2023E:91a-21: byang du da yig ral gris bskyed //
T02TD2023E:91a-22: phrag dog gshin rje gshed ljang gu //
T02TD2023E:91a-23: g-yas na ral gri mchog bsnams shing //
T02TD2023E:91a-24: g-yon na mi yi thod pa'o //
T02TD2023E:91a-25: 'di rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD2023E:91a-26: zhabs ni g-yon brkyang stabs kyis bzhugs //
T02TD2023E:91a-27: thams cad zhe sdang gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2023E:91a-28: mtshan nyid dag gi khro bo'i gzugs //
T02TD2023E:91a-29: 'on kyang de rnams phyag g-yas na //
T02TD2023E:91a-30: rang rang sku mdog rang phyag mtshan //
T02TD2023E:91a-31: gnyug ma'i shes rab gnyis med gyur //
T02TD2023E:91a-32: sku ni bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD2023E:91a-33: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas //
T02TD2023E:91a-34: rtag pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD2023E:91a-35: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ra rtsar gnas //
T02TD2023E:91a-36: sems can don mdzad bsgom par bya //
T02TD2023E:91a-37: shar du ya yig tho ba las //
T02TD2023E:91a-38: byung ba'i tho ba gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2023E:91a-39: ces grags sku mdog sngon po'i tshul //
T02TD2023E:91a-40: phyag g-yas na ni thob ste //
T02TD2023E:91a-41: g-yon na padma'i snod bsnams pa //
T02TD2023E:91a-42: lhor ni tsa yig dbyug pa las //
T02TD2023E:91a-43: byung ba'i dbyug pa gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2023E:91a-44: dkar po dbyug mchog mi thod can //
T02TD2023E:91a-45: nub tu padma gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2023E:91a-46: ni skyes chags pa mthar byed tshul //
T02TD2023E:91a-47: byang du ral gri gshin rje gshed //
T02TD2023E:91a-48: ra las phrag dog mthar byed 'dra //
T02TD2023E:91a-49: cung zad sngo ba bye brag tu //
T02TD2023E:91a-50: mdzes shing rab tu 'jigs par byed //
T02TD2023E:91a-51: thams cad gdug pa sbrul gyis brgyan //
T02TD2023E:91a-52: mche ba gtsigs shing gad rgyangs can //
T02TD2023E:91a-53: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar //
T02TD2023E:91b-0: nyi ma'i @91b dkyil 'khor yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD2023E:91b-1: rang snang shes rab yan lag sbyor //
T02TD2023E:91b-2: gnyis med ye shes rang bzhin can //
T02TD2023E:91b-3: mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa'i zhal //
T02TD2023E:91b-4: rang rang phyag mtshan thod pa can //
T02TD2023E:91b-5: sna chogs rdo rje'i grva bzhi ru //
T02TD2023E:91b-6: de bzhin lha mo zla bar bzhugs //
T02TD2023E:91b-7: shar lhor dza dang 'khor lo las //
T02TD2023E:91b-8: lha mo rdo rje tsa rtsi ka / dkar mo skem zhing drag mo che //
T02TD2023E:91b-9: gti mug gshin rje gshed gzugs ma //
T02TD2023E:91b-10: lho nub dag tu rdo rje sa //
T02TD2023E:91b-11: las skyes rdo rje phag mo ste //
T02TD2023E:91b-12: drag mo phag gi gdong can nyid //
T02TD2023E:91b-13: zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs ma //
T02TD2023E:91b-14: nub byang zur du dbyangs can ma //
T02TD2023E:91b-15: dmar mo de dang padmas bskyed //
T02TD2023E:91b-16: rab tu zhim phun sum tshogs //
T02TD2023E:91b-17: 'dod chags gshin rje mthar byed gzugs //
T02TD2023E:91b-18: byang shar mtshams su dkar mo ste //
T02TD2023E:91b-19: ljang gu 'jigs byed ra las skyes //
T02TD2023E:91b-20: phrag dog gshin rje gshed byed kyi //
T02TD2023E:91b-21: tshul dang phyag mtshan 'dzin par brtson //
T02TD2023E:91b-22: thams cad g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs //
T02TD2023E:91b-23: rang rang mtshan ma thod pa can //
T02TD2023E:91b-24: 'on kyang rdo rje phag mo dang //
T02TD2023E:91b-25: dkar mo bong thung sto ba 'phyang //
T02TD2023E:91b-26: na yo ni r'a las byung ba'i //
T02TD2023E:91b-27: thod pa bzhi ni zur bzhi ru //
T02TD2023E:91b-28: bskyed de ji ltar rang rang sngags //
T02TD2023E:91b-29: gsungs pas blo dang ldan pas dbyung //
T02TD2023E:91b-31: dkyil 'khor bdag po la bskul nas //
T02TD2023E:91b-32: sprul pa dpag med spro bar bya //
T02TD2023E:91b-33: bla med sems can don byas nas //
T02TD2023E:91b-34: dngos po kun gyi rang lus la //
T02TD2023E:91b-35: khro bo dpa' bo dgod par bya //
T02TD2023E:91b-36: dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba 'dis //
T02TD2023E:91b-37: shar gyi rmongs pa mthar byed ni //
T02TD2023E:91b-38: ra yi rtsa bar gnas sna tshogs //
T02TD2023E:91b-39: padma zla ba dag la dgod //
T02TD2023E:91b-40: ratna dhri ka ces bya ba 'dis //
T02TD2023E:91b-41: lho ra chu skyes nyi ma la //
T02TD2023E:91b-42: phra ma zhes grags spyan drangs nas //
T02TD2023E:91b-43: cho ga yis ni dgod par bya //
T02TD2023E:91b-44: a'a ro li ka ces gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2023E:91b-46: nub ra chu skyes nyi ma la //
T02TD2023E:91b-47: cho ga ji bzhin dgod par bya //
T02TD2023E:91b-48: pradzny'a dhrika gi de nyid kyis //
T02TD2023E:91b-49: phrag dog gshin rje rnam 'jig pa //
T02TD2023E:91b-50: byang gi chu skyes 'od rno bar //
T02TD2023E:91b-51: cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya //
T02TD2023E:91b-52: mung+ga dhi ka gi de nyid kyis //
T02TD2023E:91b-53: shar sgor chu skyes nyi ma la //
T02TD2023E:91b-54: tho ba gshin rje mthar byed dag / mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bsam //
T02TD2023E:92a-2: lho sgor yang dag bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD2023E:92a-3: dbyug pa dus dgra gdul dka' 'dul //
T02TD2023E:92a-4: sna tshogs padma nyi mar dgod //
T02TD2023E:92a-7: nub sgor padma nyi ma la //
T02TD2023E:92a-8: stobs po che ni bsam par bya //
T02TD2023E:92a-9: khadga dhri ba [*ka gi?] de nyid kyis //
T02TD2023E:92a-10: ral gri gshin rje zad mdzad ma //
T02TD2023E:92a-11: byang du bdud rnams sel ba po //
T02TD2023E:92a-12: sna tshogs padma nyi mar dgod //
T02TD2023E:92a-13: sna tshogs rdo rje'i grva bzhi ru //
T02TD2023E:92a-14: de bzhin gzhan yang lha mo bsgom //
T02TD2023E:92a-15: shar lhor lha mo tsa rtsi ka / drag mo rab tu 'od 'phro ma //
T02TD2023E:92a-16: mo ha ra ti'i gsangs sngags kyis //
T02TD2023E:92a-17: sna tshogs chu skyes zla bar bzhugs //
T02TD2023E:92a-18: de nas lho nub rigs kyi yum //
T02TD2023E:92a-19: rdo rje phag mo mkhas pa yis //
T02TD2023E:92a-20: dve sha ra ti de nyid kyis //
T02TD2023E:92a-21: padma zla bar dgod par bya //
T02TD2023E:92a-22: de nas nub byang mtshams su ni //
T02TD2023E:92a-23: padma zla bar dbyangs can ma //
T02TD2023E:92a-24: r'a ga ra ti'i sngags kyis dgod //
T02TD2023E:92a-25: de nas byang shar dkar mo ste //
T02TD2023E:92a-26: badzra ra ti'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2023E:92a-27: zla bar 'di rnams shis pa mtshan //
T02TD2023E:92a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi ni grva bzhi ru //
T02TD2023E:92a-29: de nyid gsum gyi thod pa'o //
T02TD2023E:92a-31: bde ba ldan pa brten byas nas //
T02TD2023E:92a-32: sngar gyi 'khor lo de nyid du //
T02TD2023E:92a-33: thim par mnyam par gzhag par blta //
T02TD2023E:92a-35: gshin rje gshed po dmar po yi //
T02TD2023E:92a-36: dkyil 'khor pa yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2023E:92a-37: mig dang sku sogs ngo bo ni //
T02TD2023E:92a-38: lha yi mngon par byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2023E:92a-39: kshem dang 'khor los gti mug bzhin //
T02TD2023E:92a-40: cung zad khro bo'i mig dag la //
T02TD2023E:92a-41: blo ldan rdo rje'i mig dgod bya //
T02TD2023E:92a-42: rna bar dzim dang rdo rje bskyed //
T02TD2023E:92a-43: rdo rje'i snang ba nag por snang //
T02TD2023E:92a-44: snar kham rin chen las byung ba'i //
T02TD2023E:92a-45: ser sna zhes bya zla ba la //
T02TD2023E:92a-46: rdo rje sna yang de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2023E:92a-47: lce la ra las padma bskyed //
T02TD2023E:92a-48: rdo rje lce ni zla bar gnas //
T02TD2023E:92a-49: 'dod chags dang mtshungs rdo rje lus //
T02TD2023E:92a-50: skam skyes ral gri las byung ba //
T02TD2023E:92a-51: phrag dog gshin rje gshed ngo bo //
T02TD2023E:92a-52: lus ming bral ba'i zla bar gnas //
T02TD2023E:92a-53: lte ba'i steng du sam rdo rjes //
T02TD2023E:92a-54: sems kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD2023E:92a-55: sgeg pa'i khro bo'i gzugs can de //
T02TD2023E:92a-56: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rnam par dgod //
T02TD2023E:92a-57: 'di ni yan lag drug dgod pa //
T02TD2023E:92a-58: mngon shes don bsgrub ched du bshad //
T02TD2023E:92b-0: snying @92b gar rdo rje'i dkyil gnas h'um //
T02TD2023E:92b-1: rdo rje h'um las thugs rdo rje //
T02TD2023E:92b-2: dus dgra'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ldan //
T02TD2023E:92b-6: 'dod chags dus dgra lta bu'i sku //
T02TD2023E:92b-7: dpal gsum rdo rje rnam par bsam //
T02TD2023E:92b-8: spyi bor aom yig 'khor lo'i dbus //
T02TD2023E:92b-10: sku yi rdo rje sku dbang phyug / sku mdog dag dang phyag mtshan mchog /'di ni de nyid gsung rdo rje //
T02TD2023E:92b-11: mchog bskyed nam mkhar gnas pa yi //
T02TD2023E:92b-12: sangs rgyas mchod la gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2023E:92b-13: de dag byin gyis brlab par bya //
T02TD2023E:92b-14: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta ci tta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2023E:92b-15: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta w'aka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2023E:92b-16: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD2023E:92b-17: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2023E:92b-18: 'jig rten bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD2023E:92b-19: sras bcas spyan drangs mdun bltas nas //
T02TD2023E:92b-20: gang zhig de rnams kyis spros pa'i //
T02TD2023E:92b-21: tsa rtsi ka sogs kyis gzung ba'i //
T02TD2023E:92b-22: zla ba lta bu'i bum pas ni //
T02TD2023E:92b-23: de rnams bkra shis glu la sogs //
T02TD2023E:92b-24: slar yang ca co'i sgra rnams kyis //
T02TD2023E:92b-25: thams cad dang ni bdag nyid la //
T02TD2023E:92b-26: dbang bskur bar ni bsam par bya //
T02TD2023E:92b-27: spyi bor gshin rje gshed dmar po //
T02TD2023E:92b-28: bdag nyid spyi bor rdo rje can //
T02TD2023E:92b-29: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2023E:92b-30: ye shes 'khor lo spyan drangs la //
T02TD2023E:92b-31: bdag nyid mdun bltas khro bo yis //
T02TD2023E:92b-32: bgegs tshar bcad cing bsrung nas ni //
T02TD2023E:92b-33: mchod yon zhabs bsil sogs phul nas //
T02TD2023E:92b-34: aom mudgar dza:zhes pa'i sngags kyis bkug nas /
T02TD2023E:92b-35: aom danda h'um zhes pa 'dis bcug la /
T02TD2023E:92b-36: aom padma bam zhes pa 'dis bcings te /
T02TD2023E:92b-37: aom khadga ho: zhes pa 'dis dbang du bya'o //
T02TD2023E:92b-38: snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2023E:92b-39: sangs rgyas spyan drangs 'dir bzhugs par //
T02TD2023E:92b-40: bltas te thugs kar zhu byas par //
T02TD2023E:92b-41: rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon gyur pa //
T02TD2023E:92b-42: rang gi rig ma'i padma yi //
T02TD2023E:92b-43: ze 'brur zla bas bskyed lha mo'i //
T02TD2023E:92b-44: 'khor lo phyag na sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD2023E:92b-45: me tog nyer spyod sogs bzung bas //
T02TD2023E:92b-46: bltas te thugs kar zhu byas pa //
T02TD2023E:92b-47: rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon gyur pa //
T02TD2023E:92b-48: sgeg bcas mchod byed de rnams kyis//
T02TD2023E:93a-0: @93a * // mchod pa glud byangs yid 'ong dang //
T02TD2023E:93a-1: sna tshogs gar gyi rang bzhin dag / bde ba chen po ster bas mchod //
T02TD2023E:93a-2: aa ye kyi kyi gshin rje gshed dmar po //
T02TD2023E:93a-3: bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin //
T02TD2023E:93a-4: kho bo khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs //
T02TD2023E:93a-5: bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spangs //
T02TD2023E:93a-6: khyod kyis gar mdzangs stengs dang //
T02TD2023E:93a-7: sa bla dang ni sa 'og g-yo //
T02TD2023E:93a-8: chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo'i 'od //
T02TD2023E:93a-9: gar mdzad khyod nyid ro langs lags //
T02TD2023E:93a-10: sku lus sbom thung dmar po ste //
T02TD2023E:93a-11: rnam pa sna tshogs sku sbrul pa //
T02TD2023E:93a-12: rdo rje dbyangs can ma yis btud //
T02TD2023E:93a-13: gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che //
T02TD2023E:93a-15: khyod ni sa gsum 'khrul pa sel //
T02TD2023E:93a-16: rje btsun snying rje'i khro bo lags //
T02TD2023E:93a-17: gar mdzad khyod ni 'jig rten gzigs //
T02TD2023E:93a-18: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD2023E:93a-19: sgra yi tshogs rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD2023E:93a-20: brag ca lta bur rnam blta zhing //
T02TD2023E:93a-22: bstod bya de rnams de bzhin des //
T02TD2023E:93a-23: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD2023E:93a-24: gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
T02TD2023E:93a-25: ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin //
T02TD2023E:93a-26: sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2023E:93a-27: ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD2023E:93a-28: gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
T02TD2023E:93a-29: sems kyi rdo rje rab tu gsal //
T02TD2023E:93a-30: rin chen rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2023E:93a-31: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD2023E:93a-32: khyab bdag chags pa'i chos 'byung gnas //
T02TD2023E:93a-33: dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog / gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2023E:93a-34: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD2023E:93a-35: gshin rje gshed po las kun byed //
T02TD2023E:93a-36: sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba //
T02TD2023E:93a-37: phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2023E:93a-38: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD2023E:93a-39: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
T02TD2023E:93a-40: sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2023E:93a-41: mgo bo gsum gyi steng gnas pa //
T02TD2023E:93a-42: a'a:yi yi ge las byung dag / padma'i snod ni bskyed nas su //
T02TD2023E:93a-44: gru gsum ram yig las byung ba //
T02TD2023E:93a-46: g-yo zhing sngo ba gzhu lta bu //
T02TD2023E:93a-47: ba dan gyis mtshan yam las byung //
T02TD2023E:93a-48: der ni rnam snang la sogs te //
T02TD2023E:93a-49: ming yig dang po las skyes pa //
T02TD2023E:93b-0: bh'um yig @93b la sogs byung ba yi //
T02TD2023E:93b-1: glang chen sha la sogs pa lnga //
T02TD2023E:93b-2: h'um skyes rdo rje'i kha chod kyis //
T02TD2023E:93b-3: bkab la de nas bsgom par bya //
T02TD2023E:93b-4: h'um skyes rdo rje'i dbyug pa yis //
T02TD2023E:93b-5: yang dang yang du dkrugs bya zhing //
T02TD2023E:93b-6: rlung gis bskyod par 'gyur ba'i me //
T02TD2023E:93b-7: 'jig dus bskal pa'i me lta bus //
T02TD2023E:93b-8: bi ra ma sogs go ku sogs //
T02TD2023E:93b-9: de dag zhu bar gyur bar bsam //
T02TD2023E:93b-10: de dang reg pa'i khol ba yi //
T02TD2023E:93b-11: khu bar 'di nyid yongs su zhu //
T02TD2023E:93b-12: rdo rje rdo rje'i dbyug pa yang //
T02TD2023E:93b-13: rang nyid zhun mar lta bu ste //
T02TD2023E:93b-14: thams cad dag cing ro gcig 'gyur //
T02TD2023E:93b-15: shin tu dri ma med par blta //
T02TD2023E:93b-16: der ni aom yig 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2023E:93b-17: sangs rgyas ye shes tshul can bkug / gsang sngags gzugs kyis bcug nas su //
T02TD2023E:93b-18: bdud rtsi lnga po mchog bltas la //
T02TD2023E:93b-19: de nyid gsum gyis byin brlabs te //
T02TD2023E:93b-20: dkyil 'khor bdag po tshim par bya //
T02TD2023E:93b-21: ljags kyi h'um las byung ba yi //
T02TD2023E:93b-22: rdo rje dkar po bltas nas su //
T02TD2023E:93b-23: de 'od sbu gu'i rnam pa yis //
T02TD2023E:93b-24: mnyam par drangs nas de yis kyang //
T02TD2023E:93b-25: sna tshogs gnas dang sangs rgyas kun //
T02TD2023E:93b-26: dkyil 'khor pa dang de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD2023E:93b-27: snying gar ye shes 'od zer dgod //
T02TD2023E:93b-28: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD2023E:93b-29: thog mtha' dbus kyi dbye ba yis //
T02TD2023E:93b-30: 'dir yang gcig tu yod min te //
T02TD2023E:93b-31: rdul phran la ni cha med phyir //
T02TD2023E:93b-32: du mar yang ni grub pa min //
T02TD2023E:93b-33: gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin du //
T02TD2023E:93b-34: gang zhig bral te de bzhin no //
T02TD2023E:93b-35: 'khrul pa'i ngo bo de nyid yin //
T02TD2023E:93b-36: gang phyir 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas //
T02TD2023E:93b-37: sems ni rtag tu 'khrul pa med //
T02TD2023E:93b-38: spro bdag ni sdud pa'i lus //
T02TD2023E:93b-39: sems can don du ro gcig byung //
T02TD2023E:93b-40: 'di las gzhan du de nyid min //
T02TD2023E:93b-41: ye shes zhabs sogs dpa' bo yis //
T02TD2023E:93b-42: 'di nyid kho na gsal bar gsungs //
T02TD2023E:93b-43: dpal ldan gsang 'dus las gsungs pa //
T02TD2023E:93b-44: 'dir ni cung zad rab tu bstan //
T02TD2023E:93b-45: byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med //
T02TD2023E:93b-46: dngos po med cing bsgom pa med //
T02TD2023E:93b-47: khams med rnam par shes pa'ang med //
T02TD2023E:93b-48: nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi //
T02TD2023E:93b-49: nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa //
T02TD2023E:93b-50: chos 'di bde ba chen po ste //
T02TD2023E:93b-51: sa med chu dang me med la //
T02TD2023E:93b-52: rlung med nam mkha' yod ma yin //
T02TD2023E:93b-53: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2023E:93b-54: 'di dag skye zhing rab tu gnas //
T02TD2023E:94a-1: po thams cad dngos min zhes //
T02TD2023E:94a-2: des na dngos po med par grags //
T02TD2023E:94a-4: rtag pa ma yin chad pa'ang min //
T02TD2023E:94a-5: phyag min zhal dang sku mdog min //
T02TD2023E:94a-6: mchog tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2023E:94a-7: dngos kun nges par bden pa min //
T02TD2023E:94a-8: thog ma dbus mtha' spangs pa nyid //
T02TD2023E:94a-9: 'di ltar rig bcas 'khor lo mchog / kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02TD2023E:94a-10: phung po khams su bdag med ma //
T02TD2023E:94a-11: bde ba dam pa'i gzugs can bsgom //
T02TD2023E:94a-12: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD2023E:94a-13: 'gro rnams gshin rje mthar byed byas //
T02TD2023E:94a-14: bkug nas de ru gnas bltas te //
T02TD2023E:94a-15: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02TD2023E:94a-16: rdo rje dang ba dang ni chos //
T02TD2023E:94a-17: ye shes pa ni ya skyes dgod //
T02TD2023E:94a-18: de la de rnams rang sa bon //
T02TD2023E:94a-20: lta zhing kun rtog ma lus spangs //
T02TD2023E:94a-21: bde ba dam pa'i rnam pa ni //
T02TD2023E:94a-22: 'phro zhing sldung [*ldud?] pa yongs su rdzogs /
T02TD2023E:94a-23: bdag nyid mkhas pas bzlas par bya //
T02TD2023E:94a-24: sku sogs spro zhing gzhug pa ni //
T02TD2023E:94a-25: rim pa bzhin nam cig car bya //
T02TD2023E:94a-26: khro bo'i tshogs rnams sprul pa ni //
T02TD2023E:94a-27: nam mkha'i dkyil rnams ma lus khyab //
T02TD2023E:94a-28: sems can don ni phun sum byas //
T02TD2023E:94a-30: hr'i:la sogs pa'i sngags zlos te //
T02TD2023E:94a-31: aom dang sv'a h'as dang mthar brgyan //
T02TD2023E:94a-32: cho ga 'di dag kho na yis //
T02TD2023E:94a-33: rnam pa kun du bsgom zhing bzlas //
T02TD2023E:94a-34: gzhan yang zas kyi bya ba la //
T02TD2023E:94a-35: sogs pa bya phyir ldang 'dod na //
T02TD2023E:94a-36: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas nas //
T02TD2023E:94a-37: sems can don la sems pa yis /
T02TD2023E:94a-38: de nyid gsum gyi cho ga bzhin //
T02TD2023E:94a-39: ye shes 'khor lo gshegs gsol te //
T02TD2023E:94a-40: cho ga ji bzhin bdag nyid la //
T02TD2023E:94a-41: bdag nyid 'khor lo bstims nas ni //
T02TD2023E:94a-42: rang gis bsags pa'i bsod nams dag / byang chub tu ni yongs bsngo zhing //
T02TD2023E:94a-43: de nas smon lam gdab bya ste //
T02TD2023E:94a-44: aom a'a:h'um mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2023E:94a-46: langs nas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i //
T02TD2023E:94a-47: rnam pa nga rgyal yang dag ldan //
T02TD2023E:94a-48: rnam pa kun du dngos po kun //
T02TD2023E:94a-49: gsang sngags ngo bo de bzhin te //
T02TD2023E:94a-50: gti mug dus dgra'i ngo bor yang //
T02TD2023E:94a-51: bsgom par bya zhing gnas par bya //
T02TD2023E:94b-0: thun gzhan du ni rnal @94b 'byor bzhin //
T02TD2023E:94b-1: dang po'i rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom //
T02TD2023E:94b-3: ye shes cung zad rjes sbyor bas //
T02TD2023E:94b-5: chen po yang dag ye shes dbang //
T02TD2023E:94b-6: gnas pas bshad bzhin cho ga yis //
T02TD2023E:94b-7: thun gcig la yang bsam gtan 'di //
T02TD2023E:94b-8: rnal 'byor chen po'i rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD2023E:94b-9: rnal 'byor pa yi spro bsdu'i sku //
T02TD2023E:94b-10: ye shes de nyid gsum bdag tshul //
T02TD2023E:94b-11: rang nyid gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02TD2023E:94b-12: dbang bskur cho ga bsgom bya zhing //
T02TD2023E:94b-13: khrus bya bza' ba'i dus su ni //
T02TD2023E:94b-14: bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga yis //
T02TD2023E:94b-15: mchod pa gzhan ni rnam brtags pa //
T02TD2023E:94b-16: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan nyid kyang //
T02TD2023E:94b-17: cho ga bzhin du rtag tu mchog //
T02TD2023E:94b-18: dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed kyi //
T02TD2023E:94b-19: rnam par blta bya byang chub brten //
T02TD2023E:94b-20: bdag gzhan mnyam pa byang chub ste //
T02TD2023E:94b-22: min na ji ltar rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD2023E:94b-23: dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur //
T02TD2023E:94b-24: ji ltar rnam pa sna chogs su //
T02TD2023E:94b-25: brtags pas dngos po gcig nyid ni //
T02TD2023E:94b-26: grol ba sdug bsngal bde bar snang //
T02TD2023E:94b-27: las kyi dbye bas skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2023E:94b-28: rnam par mi rtog bdag nyid sems //
T02TD2023E:94b-29: bde ba dam pa'i mtha' yi gzugs //
T02TD2023E:94b-30: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD2023E:94b-31: dus dgra zhes bya gang las 'bras //
T02TD2023E:94b-32: 'khor ba'i chu bo sin dhu skye 'chi rba klong dang bcas zab cing 'jigs pa chags sdang sogs //
T02TD2023E:94b-33: chu sin na kras 'khrugs shing shin tu mi brtan gnyid rmugs la sogs dbu ba can sgrol ba //
T02TD2023E:94b-34: dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar bde ba'i rang bzhin srid bral sgrub thabs skye bo kun phyir byas //
T02TD2023E:94b-35: bdag gi bsod nams gang thob des 'dir de yi go 'phang 'jig rten don kun grub par shog / dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD2023E:94b-36: pandi ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po grub pa /
T02TD2023E:94b-37: grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2023E:94b-39: // / pandi ta slob dpon chen po rje btsun nyid ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang //
T02TD2023E:94b-40: lo ts'a ba chag dge song chos rje dpal gyis gus pas mnyan nas //
T02TD2023E:95a-0: mang yul gyi bzo gnas chen por bsgyur cing zhus @95a * //
